welcome: Welcome! Let's play  Rock, Paper, Scissor, Lizard, Spock!
rules:
The Rules:
   Scissors cuts paper and decapitates lizard.
   Paper covers rock and disproves Spock.
   Rock smashes scissors and crushes lizard
   Lizard eats paper and poisons Spock
   Spock vaporizes rock and destroys scissors
rounds: The best score out of 5 rounds wins (ties not included)!
invalidUserChoice: Please enter the move or abbreviation in parentheses of your choice.
